channel.title: World Of PK (RSC project based on Geminus)
channel.description:
[size=12pt]Development Log[/size] [size=10pt]20/08/2013:[/size] [code]- Downloaded Geminus from Os1ris' thread - Cleaned the server till only login and playerupdating were left - Redid Npcupdating - Started on playersaving (to textfile for now, will convert to sql as soon I got everything saving right) * UserName * Password * Skill-levels/experience * Position - Started on playerloading (from textfile for now) * UserName * Password * Position - Started working on an eventhandler [/code]
[size=10pt]21/08/2013:[/size] [code]- Added Levelup-System - Start on Combat - Finished basic combat - added Item support (no level requirements yet) - added basic thieving using my eventmanager (no level requirements yet) - Continued on playerloading: * Now loading skills[/code]
[size=10pt]22/08/2013:[/size] [code]- Added Bubbles - Did some client refactoring (mainly for bank) - Started on Bank-system[/code]
[size=12pt]Media[/size] [size=10pt]20/08/2013:[/size] just a random picture :D [img]http://i.imgur.com/crTOUEQ.png[/img]
Simple characterfile (will be updated) [img]http://i.imgur.com/EJhjkqn.png[/img]
[size=10pt]21/08/2013:[/size] Working levelup messages [img]http://i.imgur.com/8pOBROK.png[/img]
[size=10pt]22/08/2013:[/size] Bubbles [img]http://img836.imageshack.us/img836/6822/mu50.png[/img]
Start on bank-system (only showing inventory items atm) [img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/714/3cto.png[/img]

item.title: World Of PK (RSC project based on Geminus)
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

Rodgerwilco:

Plug mc39 into varekd and ill approve this thread.

I’ll do that then.

[quote=“Fabrice L, post:43, topic:528537”][quote author=-Nothing link=topic=647291.msg4355348#msg4355348 date=1377445422]

You just inspired me to rewrite and finish the mud39 I worked on years ago.

I remember that one, still have it somewhere on my pc. (Gathering Dust)

It’s half-assed as hell. I edited the client a lot, replaced the update packets from 204 and so on.

I want to start from fresh deob, but the link for deob archive at rune-server is dead now. If someone has them I’d appreciate if you shared them.
[/quote]

Here you have the jar,

http://www.autobots.biz/rsc/mudclient39.jar[/quote]
Thank you!

Read full topic

item.title: World Of PK (RSC project based on Geminus)
item.dc:creator: @Fabrice_L Fabrice L
item.description:
@Fabrice_L wrote:

[quote=“object, post:36, topic:528537”]This is the one that was already in Geminus (the one hosted). I think bakatool wrote this method though.

[code]
public void updateBankItem(int bankIndex, int ItemID, int ItemAmount){ //bakatool,haha quickfix for nullpointer
if (bankIndex == -1 || ItemID == -1 || ItemAmount == -1) return;

outputManager.createNewPacket(214);  
outputManager.writeByte((byte)bankIndex);
outputManager.writeWord(ItemID);
if(ItemAmount < 128)
    outputManager.writeByte(ItemAmount);
else
    outputManager.writeOffsettedDWord(ItemAmount);
sendPacket();

}
[/code][/quote]

I tried by changing to this, but now the inventoryitems won’t update… while they did before, wondering if the information on the RSWiki is wrong or something…

waj:

What client did Geminus use?

#135

Read full topic

public void updateBankItem(int bankIndex, int ItemID, int ItemAmount){ //bakatool,haha quickfix for nullpointer
if (bankIndex == -1 || ItemID == -1 || ItemAmount == -1) return;

outputManager.createNewPacket(214);  
outputManager.writeByte((byte)bankIndex);
outputManager.writeWord(ItemID);
if(ItemAmount < 128)
    outputManager.writeByte(ItemAmount);
else
    outputManager.writeOffsettedDWord(ItemAmount);
sendPacket();

}
[/code][/quote]

Thanks, I’ll see if it works.

item.title: World Of PK (RSC project based on Geminus)
item.dc:creator: @Protosstribe object
item.description:
@Protosstribe wrote:

This is the one that was already in Geminus (the one hosted). I think bakatool wrote this method though.

public void updateBankItem(int bankIndex, int ItemID, int ItemAmount){ //bakatool,haha quickfix for nullpointer
    if (bankIndex == -1 || ItemID == -1 || ItemAmount == -1) return;
    
    outputManager.createNewPacket(214);  
    outputManager.writeByte((byte)bankIndex);
    outputManager.writeWord(ItemID);
    if(ItemAmount < 128)
        outputManager.writeByte(ItemAmount);
    else
        outputManager.writeOffsettedDWord(ItemAmount);
    sendPacket();
}

Read full topic

item.title: World Of PK (RSC project based on Geminus)
item.dc:creator: @Fabrice_L Fabrice L
item.description:
@Fabrice_L wrote:

I’ll post once I checked everything over, so I’m sure it works.

our bankupdate packet:

public void bankUpdate(int slot, int itemId, int itemAmount){
outStream.createNewPacket(214);
outStream.writeByte(slot);
outStream.writeWord(itemId);
outStream.writeDWord(itemAmount);
sendPacket();
}

Do you see something wrong?

Read full topic
